name: Mixtral 8x7B Instruct
description: A mixture-of-experts model with 8 experts of 7B parameters each for high-quality text generation

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate high-quality text across diverse domains and styles
examples: Write a creative short story in the style of science fiction
Create a detailed business proposal for a tech startup
Generate an academic article on cognitive psychology

skills.name: Code Generation
skills.description: Create code solutions for various programming tasks
examples: Write a Python function for natural language processing
Create a React component with state management
Develop a machine learning model for time series prediction

skills.name: Complex Reasoning
skills.description: Solve problems requiring logical reasoning and analysis
examples: Analyze the potential outcomes of this economic policy
Evaluate different approaches to solving this engineering challenge
Develop a strategy for optimizing this business process

skills.name: Knowledge Access
skills.description: Provide accurate information across diverse domains
examples: Explain the fundamental principles of quantum mechanics
Provide detailed information about historical economic trends
Describe recent advancements in artificial intelligence
